commit.message:
except.c (sjlj_find_directly_reachable_regions): Be ready for removed toplevel regions.

	* except.c (sjlj_find_directly_reachable_regions): Be ready for removed toplevel
	regions.
	(sjlj_mark_call_sites): Likewise.

From-SVN: r145565
